name: Panama Elida Vuelta Geisha
description: A unique Geisha from Elida Estate, processed using the Dark Room Dry method. This meticulous process, developed by the Lamastus family, involves drying the coffee cherries in a controlled, dark environment to achieve a distinct flavor profile. Expect a complex cup with notes of plum, apple, and camomile, complemented by a savory umami quality and a lingering finish reminiscent of green tea and brown sugar syrup. Grown at high altitudes in the Boquete region of Panama, this Geisha represents the pinnacle of coffee cultivation and processing.
